meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6371.

div.div:
2012 Teen Tournament semifinal game 1.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Eliza Scruton, a junior from Louisville, Kentucky
Ben Greenho, a junior from Plano, Texas
Catherine Briley, a senior from Grand Prairie, Louisiana

tr.td: THEY NAMED A SCHOOL FOR ME
BOOKS
THEME PARK FUN
ECONOMICALLY SPEAKING
BAD KISSERS
"HOLD" EVERYTHING
